articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: 오픈통계 팩키지 문서
articles.description: 오픈통계 팩키지 Feature에 대한 기본 내용을 정리합니다.

articles.title: 통계 팩키지
articles.contents:
.csv 데이터


library(tidyverse)

statdata_raw <- fs::dir_ls("../statdata/inst/extdata/")

statdata_csv <- statdata_raw[str_detect(statdata_raw, "csv$")] %>% 
  str_remove("../statdata/inst/extdata/") %>% 
  str_remove("\\.csv")

statdata_tbl <- tibble(csv = statdata_csv)

statdata_tbl  %>% 
  reactable::reactable()



{"x":{"tag":{"name":"Reactable","attribs":{"data":{"csv":["025원시_성별","초등과학3-2그림자길이(136쪽)","초등과학3-2우리나라해역오염실태자료(104쪽)","초등과학5-2각행성의반지름(141쪽)","초등과학5-2거리-시간그래프(115쪽)","초등과학5-2교통수단(107쪽)","초등과학5-2달리기기록(105쪽)","초등과학5-2물의온도와물기둥높이(19쪽)","초등과학5-2물의온도와붕산녹는양(95쪽)","초등과학5-2물의온도와액체기둥높이(21쪽)","초등과학5-2탐구결과(173쪽)","초등과학5-2태양에서행성까지의상대적거리(143쪽)","초등과학6-2공기중에포함된여러가지기체(79쪽)","초등과학6-2국가별이산화탄소배출량(2009)(105쪽)","초등과학6-2색소의색깔에따라얼음이녹은양(168쪽)","초등과학6-2서울과대구의기온변화(44쪽)","초등과학6-2지구온난화의원인기체(84쪽)","초등과학6-2지면과수면의온도차이(33쪽)","초등사회4-2연령별인구구성비변화(116쪽)","초등사회5-2국가별도시화율변화(120쪽)","초등사회5-2대한민국수출액(119쪽)","초등사회5-2일제시대1인당쌀소비량(78쪽)","초등사회5-2일제시대쌀생산량과수탈량자료(78쪽)","초등사회5-2초고속인터넷가입자수(120쪽)","초등사회6-2개인정보침해신고건수(97쪽)","초등사회6-2쌀소비량국제비교(83쪽)","초등사회6-2우리나라농수산물의수입과수출현황(105쪽)","초등수학4-2거실의온도(익힘책116쪽)","초등수학4-2꽃나무의키(익힘책113쪽)","초등수학4-2민수의몸무게(익힘책112쪽)","초등수학4-2수면의높이(익힘책117쪽)","초등수학4-2윗몸일으키기기록(익힘책115쪽)","초등수학4-2좋아하는민속놀이(익힘책110쪽)","초등수학4-2준성이의타자연습(익힘책125쪽)","초등수학4-2지역의월별강수량(익힘책114쪽)","초등수학4-2취미종목별참가학생수(익힘책111쪽)","초등수학4-2코스모스키의변화(익힘책120쪽)","초등수학4-2프로야구관중수(익힘책124쪽)","초등수학4-2하루중최고기온(익힘책116쪽)","초등수학4-2하루중최저기온(익힘책118쪽)","초등수학4-2학생들몸무게(익힘책94쪽)","초등수학4-2학생들키(익힘책95쪽)","초등수학5-2국가별도시화율변화(익힘책120쪽)","초등수학5-2농사짓는가구수(익힘책102쪽)","초등수학5-2시간별소금양에따른실험자료(익힘책173쪽)","초등수학5-2신생아수(익힘책111쪽)","초등수학5-2월별상담실이용자수(익힘책109쪽)","초등수학5-2제기차기횟수(익힘책105쪽)","초등수학5-2진욱이의단원평가점수(익힘책108쪽)","초등수학5-2학생들의수학점수(익힘책104쪽)"]},"columns":[{"accessor":"csv","name":"csv","type":"character"}],"defaultPageSize":10,"paginationType":"numbers","showPageInfo":true,"minRows":1,"dataKey":"9136c01972572aa97f40f008923e8efb","key":"9136c01972572aa97f40f008923e8efb"},"children":[]},"class":"reactR_markup"},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}
.csv → 팩키지 데이터


pkg_raw <- fs::dir_ls("../statdata/data/")

pkg_rda <- pkg_raw %>% 
  str_remove("../statdata/data/") %>% 
  str_remove("\\.rda")

rda_tbl <- tibble(rda = pkg_rda)

rda_tbl  %>%
  reactable::reactable()



{"x":{"tag":{"name":"Reactable","attribs":{"data":{"rda":["CO2_emissions","agro_fishery_in_out","area_monthly_precipitation","baseball_spectators_num","cosmos_height_change","counseling_user_num","country_urbanization_rate","day_highest_temp","day_lowest_temp","distance_time_graph","export_amount","expt_data_salt_hour","farming_num","favorite_folk_game","flower_tree_height","gas_in_air","gender","global_warming_gas","ground_water_temp","high_speed_internet","hobby_participating_num","ice_melt_color","jinwook_unit_score","junseong_typing_practice","kicks_num","livingroom_temps","minsu_height","newborn_num","openstat_tbl","planet_distance","planet_radius","population_age","privacy_infringement","rice_consumption_person","rice_consumption_world","rice_produced_taken","running_record","sea_pollution","search_result","seoul_daegu_temp","shadow_length","situp_record","students_height","students_math_score","students_weight","transportation","urbanization","water_height","water_temp_boric_acid","water_temp_height","water_temp_liquid_height"]},"columns":[{"accessor":"rda","name":"rda","type":"character"}],"defaultPageSize":10,"paginationType":"numbers","showPageInfo":true,"minRows":1,"dataKey":"51fd6d5e69ffb2865f785cae54abad24","key":"51fd6d5e69ffb2865f785cae54abad24"},"children":[]},"class":"reactR_markup"},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}
.csv 와 .rda 연결


csv2rda_raw <- read_lines("../statdata/data-raw/DATASET.R")

csv2rda_mask <- str_detect(csv2rda_raw, pattern = "read_csv")

csv2rda_raw <- csv2rda_raw[csv2rda_mask] %>% 
  str_split(pattern = "read_csv", simplify  = TRUE) 

csv2rda_tbl <- csv2rda_raw %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  set_names(c("rda", "csv")) %>% 
  mutate(rda = str_extract(rda, "[^\\s]*") %>% str_remove("_raw"),
         csv = str_extract(csv, "(?<=extdata).*?(?=\\.csv)")) %>% 
  mutate(csv = str_remove(csv, "/")) 

csv2rda_tbl %>% 
  reactable::reactable()

확인


csv2rda_tbl %>% 
  full_join(rda_tbl) %>% 
  full_join(statdata_tbl)  %>% 
  reactable::reactable()

articles.title: 시각화
articles.description: 단변량 범주형, 연속형 변수에 대한 시각화 방법론을 정리합니다.

articles.title: 시각화
articles.description: 단변량 범주형, 연속형 변수에 대한 시각화 방법론을 정리합니다.
